summary: The diff implements several requirements but has notable gaps. REQ-22 (title fix), REQ-23 (FarmingChatbot removal), REQ-24 (stub page redirects), REQ-25 (stub components), REQ-26 (stub hooks), REQ-27 (Home page improvements), REQ-30 (Admin Panel system reports), and partial REQ-31 (dark mode classes on some pages) appear addressed. However, REQ-28 (Applied Jobs count badge on Job Seeker Dashboard) and REQ-29 (bulk status update in Employer Dashboard) show no evidence of implementation in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add an 'Applied Jobs' count badge to the Job Seeker Dashboard tab bar showing total application count, updating without page reload.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to JobSeekerDashboard are present in the diff. The file is not listed in modified files, and there is no mention of a badge or application count in any modified file.

missing_requirements.requirement: In the Employer Dashboard, add bulk status update with checkboxes, bulk action dropdown/button, and backend calls for each selected applicant.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to EmployerDashboard are present in the diff. The file is not listed in modified files, and no bulk selection or bulk action UI is mentioned anywhere in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Registered users count should be fetched from the backend and displayed dynamically in addition to live jobs count.
missing_requirements.reason: Home.tsx only fetches active jobs via useGetActiveJobs. The stats bar uses jobs.length and static values; there is no backend query for registered users count. The file-diff summary explicitly notes stats now use jobs.length and static category count.

missing_requirements.requirement: Full dark mode coverage across all pages including JobSeekerDashboard, EmployerDashboard, JobListings, and JobDetails.
missing_requirements.reason: Only AdminPanel.tsx and Home.tsx show dark mode class additions in the diff. JobSeekerDashboard, EmployerDashboard, JobListings, JobDetails, and About are not listed as modified files.

hallucinated_features.description: Stripe import and stripeConfig variable retained in backend/main.mo
hallucinated_features.reason: The backend still imports Stripe and declares a stripeConfig variable, which is part of the old farm-market app and not requested by any requirement in this build request. Stripe is a remnant that was not requested to be kept.
